EmailTemplate.name: YCS Transfer
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
YETI Custom Shop,
The following customer would like to place an order for ___ custom Ramblers. Please reach out to this customer as we are only taking orders of 96 and above.
Name – Company name – Phone number – Email address –
Thanks,
{!User.CommunityNickname} Business Development Team YETI 512.402.5895 corporatesales@yeti.com yeti.com
